entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
